data.title: Old and New Classics: Norway's Nobel Prize Winners in Literature | IN PERSON
data.meta_description: The Mindekirken Norwegian Language & Culture Program offers classes for adults and children in Norwegian language instruction.
data.meta_site_name: Mindekirken Norwegian Language and Culture Program
data.text:
Jon Fosse, the 2023 recipient of the Nobel Prize in Literature, is the fourth Norwegian to win this prize. The others are Bjørnstjerne Bjørnson (1903), Knut Hamsun (1920), and Sigrid Undset (1928). Their lives and literary legacies are radically different from each other. We will learn about their lives and read and discuss a sampling of their work in a variety of genres. This class includes a grammar review and is conducted in Norwegian.

Texts: Supplementary Texts and Norsk grammatikk: Norsk som andrespråk, arbeidsbok by Kirsti MacDonald

When ordering books through MNLCP, you will find them listed under events. Please “register” and pay for your book as you check out. You will receive a separate email about pick-up/delivery options. Inventory is limited and we strongly urge you to reserve your copy as soon as possible.

Mondays | 6:15pm-8:15pm (CT)

March 25th - June 3rd
